channel.title: Quantum 317 [PI] Development
channel.description:
Hello, My name is Keaton and I'm one of the owners of Quantum. It is a 317 [PI]. Me and my friend decided we make a server together, he is bigger coder out of us two. Hell I suck at coding but from my opinion he's great. So, we decided we needed developers (dedicated) on our server to help add content and add to the server to make it more appealing to the RSPS community! We both are in school so we aren't on that much in the mornings going on through early afternoon. That is another reason we are looking for a development team to fill that time while we are gone. Also, We have a VPS. (Just a FYI)
EDIT: We moved on to a new base so we shut down the old one. The Client Or Webclient is not functional. We will provide a client so you can log into the new one.
Don't think since we are at school you are doing all the work. We are contributing as much as you guys do just at different times. Payment will be distributed if the server gets serious.
[u]What we asked from you.[/u]
[ul][li]Be dedicated.[/li] [li]Add content for players enjoyment. [/li] [li]Fix any bugs that you can find.[/li] [li]Have experience. [/li] [li]Be Helpful.[/li] [li]Be connected.[/li][/ul]
[b]Current Dev Team:[/b] [u]CDK (Dev Leader)[/u] [u]Kieran[/u] [u][u]Tim[/u][/u]
[size=12pt][u][b]Skype: Keatonlol[/b][/u][/size]

@quantumrsps wrote:

Hello,
My name is Keaton and I’m one of the owners of Quantum. It is a 317 [PI]. Me and my friend decided we make a server together, he is bigger coder out of us two. Hell I suck at coding but from my opinion he’s great. So, we decided we needed developers (dedicated) on our server to help add content and add to the server to make it more appealing to the RSPS community! We both are in school so we aren’t on that much in the mornings going on through early afternoon. That is another reason we are looking for a development team to fill that time while we are gone. EDIT: We moved on to a new base so we shut down the old one. The Client Or Webclient is not functional. We will provide a client so you can log into the new one.

Don’t think since we are at school you are doing all the work. We are contributing as much as you guys do just at different times. Payment will be distributed if the server gets serious.
